Welcome to Terradue's OpenSource Software repository!

Terradue is the company with a new vision to the production, management and distribution of spatial data where cloud technology joins geographical data inventory and query systems, carried out collaboratively with best-known open source projects.

Open Source projects

Component
dsione-tools CLI tools for OpenNebula to interact with DSI
FindThenFetch OpenSearch client written in Perl
jcatalogue-client a REST client APIs set for OpenSearch Geo and Temporal protocol servers
xiongnu Couchbase prototype catalogue
opennebula-occi-tsystems An OpenNebula extension to bridge OpenNebula to t-systems Dynamic Service for Infrastructure (DSI) via OCCI API
